member.name: M:Program.Game.OnUpdateFrame(OpenTK.FrameEventArgs)
member.summary: Called when it is time to setup the next frame. Add you game logic here.
member.param: Contains timing information for framerate independent logic.

member.name: M:Program.Game.OnResize(System.EventArgs)
member.summary: Called when your window is resized. Set your viewport here. It is also a good place to set up your projection matrix (which probably changes along when the aspect ratio of your window).

member.name: M:Program.Game.OnRenderFrame(OpenTK.FrameEventArgs)
member.summary: Called when it is time to render the next frame. Add your rendering code here.

member.name: P:Program.game
member.summary: The main entry point for the application.
